class.name: VoxelMeshBlockUpdateInfo
class.brief_description: Information sent by a terrain when one of its meshes is created or updated.
class.description: Information sent by a terrain when one of its meshes is created or updated. See [method VoxelTerrain._on_mesh_block_udpate]. Instances of this class must not be stored, as they will become invalid after the call they come from.

method.name: get_grid_position
method.description: Position of the mesh in block coordinates.

method.name: get_local_position
method.description: Position of the mesh in local coordinates (to the terrain).

method.name: get_mesh
method.description: Gets the mesh for this block. It can be null if no surface is present (there is no surface if the area contains only air or doesn't contain air).
